mapper.select: SELECT count(*) AS questionCount FROM question WHERE chapter_id = ${chapterId} and title like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%');

SELECT task.question_id AS id, newQuestion.question_title AS title, newQuestion.description, newQuestion.chapterName FROM task JOIN (SELECT question.id AS questionId, question.title AS question_title, question.description, chapter.title as chapterName FROM question JOIN chapter where chapter.id = question.chapter_id) AS newQuestion ON newQuestion.questionId = task.question_id WHERE task.task_time=curdate() AND task.student_id = #{id};
INSERT INTO sign_in(student_id, sign_in_datetime, sign_in_status) VALUES (#{userId}, NOW(), 1);
SELECT count(*) FROM sign_in WHERE student_id = #{id} AND sign_in_datetime like concat(curdate(), '%');
UPDATE question SET chapter_id = #{chapterId}, title = #{title}, description=#{description} WHERE id = #{id};
INSERT INTO question(chapter_id, title, description) VALUES (#{chapterId}, #{title}, #{description});
